description:
**NOTE: Scoutmob’s free mobile deals are currently only available in: Atlanta, Austin, Boston, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Los Angeles, Nashville, New York, Portland, San Francisco, Seattle and Washington, DC. 

The Scoutmob iPhone app is your mobile guide to local deals, events, restaurants and whatever else is worth exploring in your city. Think of us like a neighborhood pocket guide to supporting local businesses and finding out what’s awesome near you. The best part of all this? IT’S TOTALLY FREE... and you never have to pay upfront to get a deal.

Deals: Take advantage of FREE Scoutmob discounts to local restaurants, bars, cafes and shops on the spot. Swipe left to reveal the deals plotted on a map view. Save interesting deals to your My Stash list for later. 

Happenings: Discover upcoming events, things to do in your city and what to do this weekend (at least, according to our Scouts!).

Articles: Curious about what's new, exciting, and worth knowing in your city? Our articles keep you in the loop with interesting locally-focused stories, interviews, a calendar of events and local highlights.

For even more local goodness, visit Scoutmob.com to purchase local handmade goods in the Shoppe and browse Hand-picked restaurant & entertainment experiences in ATL and NYC. 

Read our daily email for the best of what’s added to the app along with extra content, photos and articles from our local scouts.

Looking to feature your business on Scoutmob? Contact us at getmorebusiness@scoutmob.com

Have any burning questions? Reach out to us at fannypack@scoutmob.com
releaseNotes: Fix bug with determine location in iOS8
